page.title: 17Bildeston Teacher's Day
page.content: One mother played 'Scrabble' with a group of children and one played a matching dice game. Some children played with Lego bricks, while others played in the Wendy House. Some painted and some made models from old cardboard boxes. One group chalked on the black- board. After school I collected my weekly order from Stapel's Grocery Shop and at 4.30 fetched my husband from work. We had chicken for tea with new potatoes from the garden and peas, followed by ice cream and strawberries from the garden.My evening was spent finalising the arrangements for parking cars at Chelsworth Open Gardens Day. Soon after 10.00pm I crawled into bed!
